verses.verse: Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: The gate <WH8179> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> that looketh <WH6437> toward the east <WH6921> shall be shut <WH5462> the six <WH8337> working <WH4639> days <WH3117>; but on the sabbath <WH7676> day it shall be opened <WH6605>, and on the day <WH3117> of the new moon <WH2320> it shall be opened <WH6605>.

And the prince <WH5387> shall enter <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> without <WH2351>, and shall stand <WH5975> by the post <WH4201> of the gate <WH8179>; and the priests <WH3548> shall prepare <WH6213> his burnt-offering <WH5930> and his peace-offerings <WH8002>, and he shall worship <WH7812> at the threshold <WH4670> of the gate <WH8179>: then he shall go forth <WH3318>; but the gate <WH8179> shall not be shut <WH5462> until the evening <WH6153>.
And the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall worship <WH7812> at the door <WH6607> of that gate <WH8179> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> on the sabbaths <WH7676> and on the new moons <WH2320>.

And the burnt-offering <WH5930> that the prince <WH5387> shall offer <WH7126> unto Jehovah <WH3068> shall be on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> six <WH8337> lambs <WH3532> without blemish <WH8549> and a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549>;

and the meal-offering <WH4503> shall be an ephah <WH374> for the ram <WH352>, and the meal-offering <WH4503> for the lambs <WH3532> as he is able <WH3027> to give <WH4991>, and a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> to an ephah <WH374>.

And on the day <WH3117> of the new moon <WH2320> it shall be a young <WH1121> bullock <WH6499> without blemish <WH8549>, and six <WH8337> lambs <WH3532>, and a ram <WH352>; they shall be without blemish <WH8549>:

and he shall prepare <WH6213> a meal-offering <WH4503>, an ephah <WH374> for the bullock <WH6499>, and an ephah <WH374> for the ram <WH352>, and for the lambs <WH3532> according as he <WH3027> is able <WH5381>, and a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> to an ephah <WH374>.
And when the prince <WH5387> shall enter <WH935>, he shall go <WH935> in by the way <WH1870> of the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179>, and he shall go forth <WH3318> by the way thereof <WH1870>.

But when the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall come <WH935> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> in the appointed feasts <WH4150>, he that entereth <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179> to worship <WH7812> shall go forth <WH3318> by the way <WH1870> of the south <WH5045> gate <WH8179>; and he that entereth <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the south <WH5045> gate <WH8179> shall go forth <WH3318> by the way <WH1870> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179>: he shall not return <WH7725> by the way <WH1870> of the gate <WH8179> whereby he came in <WH935>, but shall go forth <WH3318> straight before him <WH5226>.
And the prince <WH5387>, when they go in <WH935>, shall go in <WH935> in the midst <WH8432> of them <WH3318>; and when they go forth, they shall go forth together <WH3318>.

And in the feasts <WH2282> and in the solemnities <WH4150> the meal-offering <WH4503> shall be an ephah <WH374> for a bullock <WH6499>, and an ephah <WH374> for a ram <WH352>, and for the lambs <WH3532> as he is able <WH3027> to give <WH4991>, and a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> to an ephah <WH374>.

And when the prince <WH5387> shall prepare <WH6213> a <WH5071> freewill-offering <WH5930>, a burnt-offering <WH5930> or peace-offerings <WH8002> as a freewill-offering <WH5071> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, one shall open <WH6605> for him the gate <WH8179> that looketh <WH6437> toward the east <WH6921>; and he shall prepare <WH6213> his burnt-offering <WH5930> and his peace-offerings <WH8002>, as he doth on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>: then he shall go forth <WH3318>; and after <WH310> his going forth <WH3318> one shall shut <WH5462> the gate <WH8179>.

And thou shalt prepare <WH6213> a lamb <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old without blemish <WH8549> for a burnt-offering <WH5930> unto Jehovah <WH3068> daily <WH3117>: morning <WH1242> by morning <WH1242> shalt thou prepare it <WH6213>.

And thou shalt prepare <WH6213> a meal-offering <WH4503> with it morning <WH1242> by morning <WH1242>, the sixth part <WH8345> of an ephah <WH374>, and the third part <WH7992> of a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081>, to moisten the fine flour <WH5560>; a meal-offering <WH4503> unto Jehovah <WH3068> continually <WH8548> by a perpetual <WH5769> ordinance <WH2708>.
Thus shall they prepare <WH6213> the lamb <WH3532>, and the meal-offering <WH4503>, and the oil <WH8081>, morning by morning <WH1242>, for a continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>.

Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: If the prince <WH5387> give <WH5414> a gift <WH4979> unto any <WH376> of his sons <WH1121>, it is his inheritance <WH5159>, it shall belong to his sons <WH1121>; it is their possession <WH272> by inheritance <WH5159>.

But if he give <WH5414> of his inheritance <WH5159> a gift <WH4979> to one <WH259> of his servants <WH5650>, it shall be his to the year <WH8141> of liberty <WH1865>; then it shall return <WH7725> to the prince <WH5387>; but as for his inheritance <WH5159>, it shall be for his sons <WH1121>.

Moreover the prince <WH5387> shall not take <WH3947> of the people <WH5971>'s inheritance <WH5159>, to <WH3238> thrust <WH3238> them out of their possession <WH272>; he shall give inheritance <WH5157> to his sons <WH1121> out of his own possession <WH272>, that my people <WH5971> be not scattered <WH6327> every man <WH376> from his possession <WH272>.

Then he brought <WH935> me through the entry <WH3996>, which was at the side <WH3802> of the gate <WH8179>, into the holy <WH6944> chambers <WH3957> for the priests <WH3548>, which looked <WH6437> toward the north <WH6828>: and <WH4725>, behold, there was a place on the hinder part <WH3411> westward <WH3220>.

And he said <WH559> unto me <WH4725>, This is the place where the priests <WH3548> shall boil <WH1310> the trespass-offering <WH2403> and the sin-offering <WH817>, and where they shall bake <WH644> the meal-offering <WH2403>; that they bring <WH3318> them not forth into the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691>, to sanctify <WH6942> the people <WH5971>.

Then he brought me forth <WH3318> into the outer <WH2435> court <WH2691>, and caused me to pass by <WH5674> the four <WH702> corners <WH4740> of the court <WH2691>; and <WH4740>, behold, in every corner <WH4740> of the court <WH2691> there was a court <WH2691>.

In the four <WH702> corners <WH4740> of the court <WH2691> there were courts <WH2691> inclosed <WH7000>, forty <WH705> cubits long <WH753> and thirty <WH7970> broad <WH7341>: these four <WH702> in the corners <WH7106> were of one <WH259> measure <WH4060>.
And there was a wall <WH2905> round about <WH5439> in them <WH5439>, round about the four <WH702>, and boiling-places <WH4018> were made <WH6213> under the walls <WH2918> round about <WH5439>.
Then said <WH559> he unto me <WH1310>, These are the boiling - houses <WH1004>, where the ministers <WH8334> of the house <WH1004> shall boil <WH1310> the sacrifice <WH2077> of the people <WH5971>.
